01-java-refactor-aks.json.notes: Container-ready Java refactor; expect AKS/containers patterns to dominate.

02-dotnet-replatform-appservice.json.notes: .NET Framework replatform; App Mod blocks containers; expect App Service patterns.

expected_top3.name: Implement a Zero Trust Network for Web Applications by Using Azure Firewall and Azure Application Gateway

03-legacy-tolerate.json.notes: Tolerate legacy; engine should likely exclude most patterns; top3 here are fallback infra patterns.

04-mixed-java-dotnet-partial-appmod.json.notes: Mixed stack with partial App Mod; should still prefer container/microservices-friendly patterns but may ask questions.

05-java-replatform-partial-appmod-missin.notes: Incomplete App Mod; should lean toward App Service patterns with lower confidence and ask for confirmation.

06-dotnet-conflicting-signals-appmod-ove.notes: Conflicting approved services vs App Mod; App Mod wins; recommend App Service over AKS.

07-greenfield-cloud-native-perfect.json.notes: Cloud-native, event-driven, container-ready; expect AKS/containers patterns.
